content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for coming to see my apartment. I appreciate your interest. While I do want to maximize my profits, I am open to negotiation. What rental price are you willing to offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to offer 500 Euros per month. That is my final offer. Thank you for your time. TERMINATE.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your offer, Ryanah. While I appreciate your willingness to pay 500 Euros per month, I am afraid that is not within my budget. I am looking for a higher rental price to maximize my profits. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand. Thank you for letting me know. TERMINATE.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: No problem, Ryanah. I appreciate your understanding. If you have any other questions or if there is anything else I can assist you with, please do not hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
